name: HuopaEngine
description: A 2d game engine for HuopaOS (Not changed in BlobsOS!)! (Currently in beta)
author: Allucat1000

name: BorderColorChanger
description: A tool for smoothly changing your window border color in the background. Use the 'colors.json' file to change the colors!
author: Allucat1000

name: TypescriptTranspiler
description: A tool to convert a Typescript file to Javascript.
author: Allucat1000

name: TilingWinManager
description: A tiling window manager for BlobsOS with customizable settings!
author: Allucat1000

name: Doom
description: Doom as an app using JS-Dos
author: Allucat1000

name: Code
description: A code editor for BlobsOS using Monaco.
author: Allucat1000

name: FileImporter
description: A tool for importing files from your computer.
author: Allucat1000

name: Sideloader
description: An app that you can use to sideload other apps. It is recommended not to run unknown untrusted apps.
author: Allucat1000

name: BlobsClicker
description: A clicker game with a lot of stuff coming
author: BulbaSprout
